sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import { Typography, Button, Card, CardActions, CardContent, Divider, Grid, Container, CardMedia, Box } from '@material-ui/core'

import useStyles from "../styles";
import DropDown from "./subcomponents/DropDownExpertise"

import participants from "../data/Participants";

const Expertise = () => {
    const classes = useStyles()
    const cards = [1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9]
    return (
        <Container maxWidth="md">
            <Grid container spacing={2} direction="column" justifyContent="center" alignItems="center">
            <Grid item xs={12}></Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12}></Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12}>
                <Container maxWidth="md">
                    <Typography variant="h2" align="center" color="textPrimary" gutterBottom>
                        ProMiSE expertise information data
                    </Typography>
                </Container>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12}>
                <Divider p={5}/>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12}>
                <Box sx={{ width: '100%'}}>
                    <Divider p={5}/>   
                </Box>
            </Grid>
            <Grid item xs={12}>
                <Container maxWidth="md">
                    <DropDown/>
                </Container>
            </Grid>
            <Container className={classes.container} maxWidth="md">
                <Grid container spacing={4}>
                {participants.map((participant) => (   
                <Grid item key={participant.name} xs={12} sm={6} md={4}>
                        <Card className={classes.card}>
                            <CardMedia 
                                className = {classes.cardMedia}
                                image={require('../data/participant_profiles/'+String(participant.name)+'.jpg')} 
                            />
                            <CardContent className={classes.cardContent}>
                                <Typography variant="h5">
                                    {participant.name}
                                </Typography>
                                <Typography>
                                    This is a media card. You can describe the content here
                                </Typography>
                            </CardContent>
                            <CardActions>
                                <Button size="small" color="primary">View</Button>
                                <Button size="small" color="primary">View</Button>
                            </CardActions>
                        </Card>
                    </Grid>
                    ))}
                </Grid>
            </Container>
        </Grid>
        </Container>
    );
}

export default Expertise;
